title: Sagar Rumandla

header.name: Sagar Rumandla
header.bio: I am a passionate Java Developer with a proven ability to build and develop high-quality backend applications. I have experience in creating efficient RESTful APIs using Java and Spring Boot, ensuring they work well with frontend systems. I enjoy working in teams to deliver solutions that meet user needs and continuously seek to learn and grow in my field.

projects.title: GenAI Prompt Generation POC
projects.description: For an internal Capgemini POC, I executed prompt generation using GenAI, Python, and Streamlit. I completed training in GenAI and successfully delivered proof-of-concept tasks, collaborating with teams on prompt processing solutions.

projects.title: 890 Enterprise
projects.description: At 890 by Capgemini, I developed a scalable REST API using Java Spring Boot, ensuring seamless integration between frontend and backend components. I configured data through XML and implemented crucial security measures to enhance system robustness. I collaborated closely with frontend developers to ensure smooth communication and data exchange.

projects.title: MeduGlobal
projects.description: In the MeduGlobal project, I created a robust REST API with Java Spring Boot for a student portal offering college applications, job opportunities, scholarships, and loans. I managed data through XML and implemented JUnit test cases to ensure comprehensive testing and bug fixes. I worked closely with frontend developers to facilitate seamless integration.
